Home-Discover.title: Discover digital art & Collect NFTs
Home-Discover.description: NFT marketplace UI created with Anima for Figma. Collect, buy and sell art from more than 20k NFT artists.

Home-trend.title: Trending Collection
Home-trend.description: Checkout our weekly updated trending collection.

Home-top-creators.title: Top Creators
Home-top-creators.description: Checkout Top Rated Creators on the NFT Marketplace

Home-How-it-works.title: How it works
Home-How-it-works.description: Find out how to get started
Home-How-it-works.setup-description: Set up your wallet of choice. Connect it to the Animarket by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner.
Home-How-it-works.create-description: Upload your work and setup your collection. Add a description, social links and floor price.
Home-How-it-works.mint-description: Choose between auctions and fixed-price listings. Start earning by selling your NFTs or trading others.

Home-Join-Us.title: Join our weekly digest
Home-Join-Us.description: Get exclusive promotions & updates straight to your inbox.

Footer.Exclusive: Get exclusive promotions & updates straight to your inbox.

Create-Account.description: Welcome! enter your details and start creating, collecting and selling NFTs.

Create-Wallet.description: Choose a wallet you want to connect. There are several wallet providers.
